about_the_game:
Welcome to Dinus Escape, a precision platformer that will test your skills and reflexes to the limit!

Dinus is a little dinosaur living in a prehistoric world full of dangers. On a fateful day, Dinus realizes that a giant meteor is about to collide with Earth, causing mass extinction! With only 10 seconds to react, you must help Dinus collect all the pieces of meat in each level and take refuge in his cave before it's too late!

Dinus Escape is an exhilarating 2D precision platformer where you control Dinus, a charming dinosaur who must collect all 3 pieces of meat scattered throughout the level before hiding in his cave. But don't be fooled, the mission is challenging: the world is about to end! A meteor is on its way, and you have only 10 seconds to help Dinus survive and escape the impending disaster. With graphics inspired by classic cartoons, Dinus Escape combines nostalgia and adrenaline in a unique experience.

Gameplay:

Control Dinus in a 2D environment filled with challenges and obstacles.
Each level has 3 pieces of meat that must be collected before time runs out.
Use your precision skills to navigate platforms, avoid dangers, and reach Dinus's cave.
Challenge yourself with increasingly difficult levels and hone your precision and speed.

Features:

2D Platform Action: Move with precision in a world full of dangers.
Classic Cartoon Graphics: Inspired by classic cartoons, with a charming and nostalgic visual style.
Time Challenge: You have only 10 seconds per level, adding an extra layer of urgency and excitement.
Various Levels: Face 50 levels with unique challenges that will test your skills.

name: Dinus Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 5770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Dinus Escape is an 2D precision platformer where you control Dinus, a charming dinosaur who must collect all 3 pieces of meat scattered throughout the level, while the world is about to end! A meteor is on its way, and you have only 10 seconds to help Dinus survive and escape the impending disaster!
